queries: code that fetches scenes by applying filters, sort order, and limit to the result. Returns scenes from the server as plain JavaScript objects
fetch scenes from a database based on specified query parameters
get scenes with specified options like limit and search filters
implementation code to retrieve scenes from the server based on specified query parameters. Supports filtering, sorting, and limit options
initialize object with default options, modify based on provided options, execute final query using database function, and return scenes as array of JavaScript objects
retrieve a collection of scenes with filtering options
retrieve a specific scene from the server
